SEARCH
Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services

Interface IAuthService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthService
public interface IAuthService
This interface defines the contract for a service that manages authorized persons.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAuths

      List<AuthDTO> getAllAuths(AuthFilter filter, int page, int size)
      Retrieves a list of all authorized persons.
      Parameters:
      filter - object with fitlers
      page - The page number for pagination (default is 0).
      size - The number of records per page (default is 10).
      Returns:
      A list of AuthDTO representing all authorized persons.

    • getAuthsByDocNumber

      List<AuthDTO> getAuthsByDocNumber(Long docNumber)
      Retrieves a list of individual authorizations by document number.
      Parameters:
      docNumber - the document number of the authorized person.
      Returns:
      a list of AuthDTO representing the authorized persons.

    • getAuthsByType

      List<AuthDTO> getAuthsByType(VisitorType visitorType)
      Retrieves a list of individual authorizations by document number.
      Parameters:
      visitorType - the type of the visitor.
      Returns:
      a list of AuthDTO representing the authorized persons.

    • getAuthsByTypeAndExternalId

      List<AuthDTO> getAuthsByTypeAndExternalId(VisitorType visitorType, Long externalID, Long plotId)
      Retrieves individual authorizations by document number.
      Parameters:
      visitorType - the type of the visitor.
      externalID - the external ID for the authorization.
      plotId - the plot ID for the authorization.
      Returns:
      a list of AuthDTO authorized persons.

    • createAuthorization

      AuthDTO createAuthorization(VisitorAuthRequest visitorAuthRequest)
      Authorize visitor with authorized ranges.
      Parameters:
      visitorAuthRequest - the request containing visitor authorization details.
      Returns:
      the created AuthDTO authorization.

    • authorizeVisitor

      AccessDTO authorizeVisitor(AccessDTO accessDTO, Long guardID)
      Authorize visitor with authorized ranges.
      Parameters:
      accessDTO - the access details for the visitor.
      guardID - the ID of the guard authorizing the access.
      Returns:
      the created AccessDTO authorization.

    • getValidAuthsByDocNumber

      List<AuthDTO> getValidAuthsByDocNumber(Long docNumber)
      Retrieves a list of valid authorizations by document number.
      Parameters:
      docNumber - the document number of the authorized person.
      Returns:
      a list of valid AuthDTO authorizations.

    • updateAuthorization

      AuthDTO updateAuthorization(AuthDTO existingAuth, VisitorDTO visitorDTO, VisitorAuthRequest visitorAuthRequest)
      Update authorization list with new authorized ranges.
      Parameters:
      existingAuth - the existing AuthDTO authorization.
      visitorDTO - the VisitorDTO of the visitor.
      visitorAuthRequest - new authorization details.
      Returns:
      the updated AuthDTO authorization.

    • isAuthorized

      Boolean isAuthorized(Long documentNumber)
      Checks if a person with the given document number has a valid invitation.
      Parameters:
      documentNumber - The person's identification number.
      Returns:
      true if a valid invitation exists, false otherwise.

    • deleteAuthorization

      AuthDTO deleteAuthorization(Long authId)
      Deletes the authorization by ID.
      Parameters:
      authId - the ID of the authorization to delete
      Returns:
      the deleted AuthDTO

    • deleteAllAuthorizationsByDocNumber

      List<AuthDTO> deleteAllAuthorizationsByDocNumber(Long docNumber, DocumentType documentType)
      Deletes the authorizations by document number.
      Parameters:
      docNumber - document number of the authorized person.
      documentType - document type of authorized person.
      Returns:
      the deleted AuthDTO

    • activateAuthorization

      AuthDTO activateAuthorization(Long authId)
      Activates the authorization by ID.
      Parameters:
      authId - the ID of the authorization to activate
      Returns:
      the activated AuthDTO

    • updateAuthorizationByAuthid

      AuthDTO updateAuthorizationByAuthid(VisitorAuthRequest visitorAuthRequest)
      Update authorization list with new authorized ranges.
      Parameters:
      visitorAuthRequest - new authorization details.
      Returns:
      the updated AuthDTO authorization.
